definition: The German word "Tod" refers to the state or condition of permanent cessation of all vital functions in a living organism. It is commonly used to describe the concept of death, encompassing the end of life and the absence of any biological activity.

examples.german: Sie trauert um den Tod ihres Vaters.
examples.english: She mourns the death of her father.
